page.title: 08Farming
page.content: Most of the fields in this area are grassland and there is some wheat, corn and barley grown. Much of the area is devoted to farming, especially dairy farming.There are ten farms in our area. Milton Farm, Slaughtergate Farm, Wyke Farm, Bainly Farm, Pierston Farm, Stock Farm, Whistley Farm, Lower Langham Farm, Depley Farm and Quarr Farm. These are mainly dairy farms. There is also a pig farm. Much of the grass grown on farmland is cut in summer and stored as silage to make winter feed for the herds. The milk produced on these farms is collected daily and frequently checked for quality by a government body. The farmers are also only allowed to produce a certain quota of milk by the government.
